title: Knowledge in Ancient Egypt - Kemetic Wisdom & History
author: marsresident / Van Kush Family
overview: Comprehensive guide to Ancient Egyptian (Kemetic) knowledge, key figures, the complex soul concept, gods as universities, and historical connections to modern concepts

opening_wisdom.quote: Do not be proud on account of your knowledge, but discuss with the ignorant as with the wise. Fine words are more sought after than Emeralds, but can be found with the maidens at the grindstone.

perspective_shift.duration: Ancient Egypt existed for 3000+ years. US is less than 300 years old
perspective_shift.brain_reality: Your brain is not bigger than an Ancient Egyptian's
their_knowledge: Electricity (static, electric eels 'Thunderer of the Nile', lightning)

interpretations: Reference to fertile ground around Nile
Reference to skin color of African desert tribes

perspective_shift.kemetic_thinking: When you think like an Egyptian, the world becomes more clear - we are on a trail blazed 5,000+ years ago

jesus_context.misconception: People think Jesus times were near the 'Beginning'
jesus_context.reality: By Jesus' time: Roman Empire existed, Alexander dead 500+ years, Hellenization created international-multicultural world
jesus_context.their_belief: They believed they were peak of human achievement (see Polybius)

scarab_beetle_thesis.symbolism: Like Butterfly to Western Society - Change, Metamorphosis, Reincarnation, Generations, Day after Day, Eternity

khepri_god.function: Force that pushed Sun across sky like Scarab pushes dung ball

scarab_beetle_thesis.afterlife_theory: We are in a shell, leaving shell = moving to next stage. Pyramids may be Metamorphosis chambers modeled after dung ball
scarab_beetle_thesis.2014_discovery: Scarab Beetles use stars and sun to navigate
scarab_beetle_thesis.original_thesis: Scarabs physically mapped stars for Egyptians by following them and drawing lines in sand

first_star_map.significance: First man-made map of stars known to modern man
first_star_map.overturns: Common belief that Mesopotamia was first to map sky
first_star_map.connection: Likely made based on map drawn by Scarab first

symbolism_explained.symmetry_connection: Symbol shows something it isn't actually showing, but when compared should be same on both sides

examples.america: Eagle (Franklin said Americans were more like Turkeys with powdered wigs)

symbolism_explained.memphis_example: Andrew Jackson named Memphis, Tennessee after Memphis, Egypt due to similar position on Mississippi/Nile

king_scorpion_ii.culture: Naqqa III culture, before Kemet existed
king_scorpion_ii.achievement: United Upper and Lower Kemet (may be same as Narmer/Menes)
king_scorpion_ii.source: Hieroglyphic story carved on stone Mace head
king_scorpion_ii.goddess_bat: Represents 2 banks of Nile, 2 Kingdoms, Future/Past, Male/Female - duality
king_scorpion_ii.trade: Evidence of Kemetic settlements in Canaan, Lapis Lazuli from Afghanistan

king_tut.father: Akhenaten (most hated King in Kemet history)
akhenaten_crimes: Got rid of all Gods for one God Aten
king_tut.ghost_curse: Amun priesthood set Akhenaten's ghost to wander Desert - people still claim to meet him
king_tut.name_change: Tutankhaten (Living Image of Aten) â†’ Tutankhamun (Living Image of Amun)

advisors.ay: Power behind throne, later became King. Prenomen: Kheperkheperure (Everlasting are Manifestations of Ra)
advisors.horemheb: Military commander, later became King. Destroyed Akhenaten's statues, banned Aten worship, re-stabilized

imhotep.role: Vizier/Chancellor to King Djoser (like King's Sorcerer and Adviser)
imhotep.unique_method: Read books while other Viziers read entrails, ashes, tea leaves, bird patterns
imhotep.achievements: Solved 7 year Famine (may inspire Joseph story with Coat of Many Colors)
imhotep.legacy: Temple in his name became first Hospital
imhotep.medical_theory: Placebo effect is a must - medicine only effective with proper incantations/chants

ptahhotep.age: Said to be 110 years old - saw 100+ years of progress
ptahhotep.work: The Ptahhotep Sebayt (37 Maxims of Ptahhotep)
ptahhotep.foundation: Derived from Ma'at - cosmic order and social harmony
ptahhotep.category: Mirror for Princes - written for son taking his position
ptahhotep.significance: Long thought to be world's oldest book

moses_analysis.bible_claim: Raised as prince to Pharaoh, wrote everything in Old Testament up to him
moses_analysis.kemetic_records: Moses not mentioned anywhere (Egyptians kept extremely detailed records)
moses_analysis.christian_claim: Some claim Moses is Thutmose/Thutmosis (King's Sculptor)
moses_analysis.slavery_evidence: No evidence of Slavery in Kemet outside of defeating invading armies

jewish_records.elephantine_papyri: Jewish people as soldiers in Kemetic military with freedom and own Temple
jewish_records.septuagint: First Official Old Testament written in Kemet during Alexander/Ptolemy era by 70 Jewish Egyptians

moses_analysis.closest_parallel: Ipuwer Papyrus - servants (not slaves) strike, causing 'plagues' from upper class dependence on lower class

if_true_implications.42_laws_of_maat: Very similar to 10 Commandments (rules for Afterlife, avoid Anubis eating soul)
if_true_implications.tree_of_life: Acacia Tree - same used in Numbers to build Tabernacle, Ark of Covenant, Moses' Altar
if_true_implications.atum_adam: Kemetic God of Creation similar in name to Adam
if_true_implications.set_seth: Kemetic deity Set/Seth - Seth also 3rd son of Adam and Eve

kemetic_soul_concepts.christian_comparison: Christianity made up 'on the fly' - Kemetic much more intricate and realistic

eye_of_horus.function: Protection, Symbolizes 6 Senses (Taste, Touch, Sight, Hearing, Smell, Thought), allows dead to see

sheut.preservation: Statues and Silhouettes made to preserve Shadow after death

ren.belief: As long as name spoken, Soul still alive. More written = more chances of surviving and being spoken

ka.function: Life Spark determining alive or dead

ib.belief: Heart was seat of body (flows to all parts), not brain
ib.legacy: 'Follow your heart', 'heartbroken', pointing at heart when saying 'Me'

ba.applies_to: Anything - instruments, cars, guns, pipes/bongs given Ren
ba.dreams: Part of person you see in dreams, even after death
ba.christian_translation: So different they had to use 'Psyche' to explain Christian soul
ba.ram_connection: Ba for Soul = Ba for Ram, hence dead/Gods depicted with Horns, Ram sacrifices

akh.afterlife: Ba and Ka come together to reform Akh

gods_as_universities.principle: Each God and Temple was like a modern University

bes_beset.function: Protector of households, mothers, children, childbirth, God of Dwarves
bes_beset.evolution: Became defender of everything good, enemy of all bad
bes_beset.era: Present since Old Kingdom, widespread from New Kingdom

maat.cosmology: Set order of universe from chaos at creation
maat.legal_system: Kemet had Courts, Laws, Civil Cases (see 'The Eloquent Peasant')

wadjet.function: Protector of Kings & Country, Goddess of Oracles
wadjet.pharaoh_correction: 'Par-Oh' is the palace name, not a person. No such person as 'Pharaoh'
wadjet.wadjet_bast: Eventually merged with Bast (Goddess of Felines)

heget_hecate.heget: Frog Goddess - appeared during flood time (Nile worship benefit)
heget_hecate.hecate_evolution: Became Goddess of Magic with torch and thorny crown

statue_of_liberty.copper_knowledge: People knew copper turns green for thousands of years (see Shilpa Shastra)

heget_hecate.kek_pepe: Pepe the frog from 2016 Election is actually Kek, modern cult of Kek spread Pepe meme

land_of_punt.significance: If found, probably discover culture that brought Civilization to Babylonians and Egyptians
land_of_punt.hepshesut: Female King who wore false beard, established trade with Punt
land_of_punt.current_theory: East Africa (but no structures or gold found there)
land_of_punt.stilt_houses: Kemetic carvings show Punt people in stilt houses (common around Switzerland, Scottish Crannoges)
land_of_punt.identification_key: Will be found where stilt houses used and incense trees existed

quiz_questions.q: What did Imhotep invent and what was unique about his method?
quiz_questions.a: Surgery, Medicine, Columns, Stairs - he READ BOOKS while other Viziers read entrails and omens
quiz_questions.explanation: His temple became the first Hospital

quiz_questions.q: What are the components of the Kemetic soul?
quiz_questions.a: Sheut (Shadow), Ren (Name), Ka (Life Spark), Ib (Heart), Ba (Personality), Akh (Mind/Ego)
quiz_questions.explanation: Much more intricate than Christian soul concept

quiz_questions.q: What was the 2014 discovery about Scarab Beetles?
quiz_questions.a: They use stars and sun to navigate - may have physically mapped stars for Egyptians
quiz_questions.explanation: First star map at Nabta Playa may be based on Scarab-drawn lines

quiz_questions.a: The Palace - there was no person called 'Pharaoh', it was where holy things resided including the King

quiz_questions.q: What connection does the Statue of Liberty have to Kemetic religion?
quiz_questions.a: Green like frog goddess Heget, torch like Hecate, Helios/thorny crown - copper turning green was known
quiz_questions.explanation: Heget was frog Goddess of flood water
